summary: A cool retexture of the glass sword
descriptionHtml:
This is my retexture of the glass sword, right now it replaces all glass swords, but when the Creation KIt comes out I\'ll make it a separate item and may even include a quest! (Accepting ideas ;P)
Place in: C:/Program files/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/data

If you want to use this in your mod just ask! I\'ll probably say yes.

Credits: Myself, Bethesda for creating the beautiful Skyrim.
author: waelyN
